page.title: 11LAINDON'S BOUNDARIES
page.content: {Tillingham Hall}is a proposed new town to be built on green belt land between {Bulphan and West Horndon.}These villages are about three kilometres from Laindon. The people living in these villages are totally opposed to the venture and are trying to persuade the council to turn down planning permission for the town. {Consortium Developments,}the company who propose to build the town argue that it will provide over 3,000 jobs and will provide 14,000 houses as a contribution to the 884,000 homes that will be needed by 1991. The town will also include three primary schools, one secondary school, a playgroup, health centre, police station and a fire station.
